posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here you go: I had to delay the 10th level of RDD until level 40 so that the 20th level of Bard could be at level 39 to meet the requirements of Lasting Inspiration.

Celetial Shadow Dragon (Bard 20 / Red Dragon Disciple 10 / Shadowdancer10)
Human, Non-Lawful
Playable 1 - 40

Notes:
Made for Half Cestial subrace on Tornado of Souls PW (Restrictions: None, Favored class: None, Benefits: Low Lightvision, +3 Str, Con, Wis and Cha, +2 Dex & Int, 50% Cold, Acid, Electrical Immunity, Immunity Disease, +4 Fort save, Negatives: 50% Vul to Negative Energy and fire, ECL 4) Note: The 50% vulnerability to fire from Half Celectial combined with the 100% immunuty to fire from RDD will result in a 50% immunity to fire.

Your perform skill keeps up with your Bard levels until level 38, when you will be 1 point shy of the level 19 song. At level 39, you will have the level 19 song, but you will be 5 points shy of the level 20 song. At level 40, the +2 CHA will bring you to 4 points shy of the level 20 song. It shouldn't be too hard to make up for that with gear.

Your net UMD will be only 39 until the level 40 Charasma boost, which meaans that you will only be able to use items as if your UMD was 35 until level 40.

You can choose to replace Improved Crit with Knockdown, if you value that more. Another option would be to use a finessable Simple weapon, either a mace or a dagger, allowing you to drop Weapon Proficiency: Martial. Then you could move Blind Fight to level 1 and take Knockdown at level 9 and keep Improved Crit.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
What empyre made, already has trhe optiimal lvl spread. If you rise Rdd by ten lvls for example you will have to reduce Bard to 10 and then loose 5 AC from his song to gain merely 2 from dragonic skin. The only reason you might want more Rdd lvls/ less Bard lvls in this build is if you know you can aleady cap your dodge bonus to +20 via items, haste counds also as dodge bonus keep that in mind. Lets say (Boots of the Sun Soul +10, Bard song, mage armour, Haste) would cap that and then you would gain AC only from Rdd's dragonic skin.

By the way this build has in a (+5 items, module/ pw) 80 AC plus ED.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Furthermore, he would have the same AC with Monk robe and shield as with armor and shield (assuming the same armor bonus on the robe and the armor). That would help with casting (with casting penalty only from shield).
